long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make prospecting tasks disappear. At warp speed. 
Periscope is the world's first app custom built for business development rockstars. 

This is not your usual chrome extension. Periscope comes with custom built automations for sales development workflows. Book 2X more meetings.

Super Power - 1 
You get a cheatsheet of “high intent” accounts that will otherwise stay under radar. From inside LinkedIn

Super Power - 2
Assess target buyer's profile
whether they have the authority and likelihood to buy 

Super Power - 3
Your research notes fill itself automatically. Through automation

Super Power - 4
You get icebreakers/intro line for GMail/Zoom without spending any time on research

Super Power - 5
Find work-from-home phone and deep inspected email
Deep inspected mails are real time validated with confidence score 

Super Power - 6
You get to monitor your competitor and scoop meetings from their interactions with decision makers

Who is Periscope Extension for?
Periscope is custom built for sales development professionals. Get more positive replies. Book 2X more meetings.

For any support or queries, please contact support@glowradius.com
